thing-type.label: Pingable network device
thing-type.description: The presence detection is performed by using ICMP and, if available, ARP pings. You can change the arping tool path in the binding configuration. DHCP sniffing is performed for faster network reentry discovery.

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Hostname or IP
parameter.description: Hostname or IP of the device

parameter.name: refresh_interval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: States how long to wait after a device state update before the next refresh shall occur (in ms)

parameter.name: retry
parameter.label: Retry
parameter.description: How many refresh interval cycles should a presence detection should take place, before the device is stated as offline

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.label: Timeout in ms
parameter.description: States how long to wait for a response (in MS), before if a device is stated as offline

thing-type.label: Network device with running service
thing-type.description: A device which reachable state is detected by connecting to a TCP port. DHCP sniffing is performed for faster network reentry discovery.

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Hostname or IP
parameter.description: Hostname or IP of the device

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: The port on which the device can be accessed. Windows systems usually have the 445 port open. Webservers are on port 80.

parameter.name: retry
parameter.label: Retry
parameter.description: Defines how many times a connection attempt shall occur, before the device is stated as offline

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.label: Timeout
parameter.description: States how long to wait for a response (in MS), before if a device is stated as offline

parameter.name: refresh_interval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: States how long to wait after a device state update before the next refresh shall occur (in ms)

channel-type.label: Online
channel-type.description: States whether a device is online or offline

channel-type.label: Latency (ms)
channel-type.description: States the latency time in milliseconds
